title: [Yegharren Plain, High Plains]
description: Mist swirls down from the higher moors to the north, swept by the constant wind in an ethereal dance.  Patches of silvery heather stand interspersed with patches of barren, stony ground, and the gusting wind occasionally blows an uprooted branch across the desolate plain.

Mist swirls down from the higher moors to the north, swept by the constant wind in an ethereal dance.  Patches of moonlit heather stand interspersed with patches of barren, stony ground, and the gusting wind occasionally blows an uprooted branch across the desolate plain.
